Umanga Bista

Research Assistant @LogPoint

Lalitpur, Nepal.

umanga.bista@logpoint.com

Student @Coursera

I was a computer engineering student at Institute of Engineering, Central Campus Pulchowk, Lalitpur, Nepal.

Research Interests

  • Machine Learning, Data analysis and Anomaly Detection
  • Streaming Algorithms and Mining
  • Algorithms and Optimisation
  • Distributed Algorithms

I'm currently working on distrbuted streaming algorithms for log mining. I work on clustering of log messages in real time, and anomaly detection based on statistical techniques for SIEM solutions.

Previously, I have worked on financial data representation and mining using XBRL for annual financial statements collected by Office of Company Registrar, Nepal.
